sentences.en: 'she had it wrapped in tissue paper on her bureau. "
sentences.cn: “ 她用薄纸包着放在她的梳妆台上. ”

sentences.en: " Here,'she said, taking them out of the bureau drawer.
sentences.cn: “ 在这里. " 她说着从五斗橱的抽屉里拿出手套.

sentences.en: Contact the Tourist Information Bureau for further details.
FBI demands its employees absolute allegiance to this bureau.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局要求其雇员对该局绝对忠诚.

sentences.en: He is in the marriage bureau business, which is mildly ironic seeing that his dearest wish is to get married himself.
sentences.cn: 他从事婚姻介绍工作，这多少有点讽刺意味，因为他最大的愿望就是自己能结婚。

sentences.en: I should respect the findings of your inspection bureau.
sentences.cn: 我完全尊重贵方检查部门的检查结果.

sentences.en: I took it from your mother's bureau in Louisville.
sentences.cn: 我是从路易斯维你母亲梳妆台上拿来的.

sentences.en: I'm saving my, strength for going to the Bureau of Education.
sentences.cn: 我省了气力还要上教育局呢.

sentences.en: The auctioneer knocked the bureau down to a furniture dealer from York.
sentences.cn: 拍卖者将写字台卖给从约克来的家具商.

sentences.en: The bureau of cherry was also high and wide and solidly built.
sentences.cn: 那个樱桃木镜也做得又高又大,十分牢固.

sentences.en: The educational bureau demands that all schools introduce a new course into the curriculum.
sentences.cn: 教育局要求所有的学校开设一门新课程.

sentences.en: The Tourist Bureau arranged everything for our journey to Rome.
sentences.cn: 旅游局已为我们去罗马旅行准备了一切.

sentences.en: The weather bureau makes daily reports on weather conditions.
sentences.cn: 气象局每天报告天气状况.

sentences.en: Those lorries are manufactured to the order of the Communication Bureau.
sentences.cn: 那些卡车是按交通局的订货单制造的.

phrases.tran_cn: 人口统计局，人口调查局；人口普查局

trans.tran_cn: 局，（提供某方面信息的）办事处，（美国政府部门）局，（附抽屉及活动写字台的）书桌
trans.tran_en: a government department or a part of a government department in the US
